name: roomRequest-Spark-Bot
description: roomRequest is a Cisco Spark bot created to help users find and book available conferences rooms.

public_address.description: Publicly accessible FDQN of the application. If Heroku use the full URL (eg. https://app.herokuapp.com

COLLECTION.description: MongoDB Collection name containing building information.

SUPPORTSPACE.description: Space space ID that users can be added to when using the support keyword.
